attributes.review: In order to support my favorite USA president I wanted to download the app to keep up with him, but when I downloaded the app it would kick me out. Once I finally got it to work it was asking for too much information that I thought was unnecessary but nevertheless I still gave it as I love my president. A few days later I was getting constant spam. This app was very underwhelming the set up is visually unpleasing very disappointed as an extremely dedicated fan. I write this review definitely not to mock the app but to share the lackluster experience of this app. Please get rid of it as it has cause more harm than good

It works very slowly and wouldnâ€™t let me click to put my number in.  The notifications, even though I enabled them, wouldnâ€™t pop up for me either.
